information.name: HuggingFace Image Classification Inference
information.description:
This block performs image classification on a specified Hugging Face dataset using a Hugging Face model pipeline.

 Inputs:
- `dataset_name` (str): Name of the Hugging Face dataset.
- `split_name` (str): Dataset split to use.
- `model_name` (str): Name of the Hugging Face model.
- `n_samples` (int): Number of samples to process.

 Outputs:
- `images` (list): Paths to the processed images.
- `predictions` (list): Predicted classes for the images.

node.pos_z: 999, this is the z-index for 2D canvas
